DOC.brief_summary: The primary endpoint trial evaluate single administration human lemon ice tea contain 500 mg polyphenol-rich algal powder able reduce postprandial glycemia insulinemia .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Brown Seaweed Extract Rich Polyphenols Glycemic Response Sucrose Human
